statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE interactions_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT customer_id, interactions_count FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY interactions_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, interactions_count FROM customer_profiles WHERE interactions_count >= 5 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interactions_count DESC, customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR email LIKE '%yahoo.com' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE interactions_count BETWEEN 3 AND 8 ORDER BY interactions_count DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main St' LIMIT 5

SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions INNER JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name='Alice' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, count(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 3
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, interaction_count FROM customer_profiles WHERE interaction_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE interaction_count > 10
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchases ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN promotions ON purchases.product_name = promotions.promotion_name WHERE promotions.discount_amount > 0.2
SELECT cp.name, p.promotion_name, p.discount_amount FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN promotions p ON cp.customer_id = p.promotion_id WHERE p.discount_amount < 0.1
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE points > 100;
SELECT * FROM interaction_logs ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC;
SELECT customer_id, promotion_name FROM customer_promotions INNER JOIN promotions ON customer_promotions.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT event_type, event_details FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, email, points FROM customer_profiles WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM interaction_logs WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC, interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date <= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_details FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.campaign_name FROM customer_profiles c JOIN targeted_promotions tp ON c.customer_id = tp.customer_id JOIN promotion_campaigns p ON tp.promotion_campaign_id = p.campaign_id;
